reviewText: I almost bought this dvd, but after reading the review I was glad that I didn't. I hate when they try to sell us movies that are cut and then call it unrated. Please save us the time and money and offer us the original version or not at all.

I love Holly Sampson and she looks great in this film.  The problem is that this film has edited every love scene into some sort of joke.  If there is an unedited version then this could be a good softcore movie but the version I purchased was garbage.  Is there anything worse then a edited softcore movie?

This movie was not as good as I had hoped. There are two main women in this movie - one is extremely hot, the other just so-so. There is a little bar maid that I wish I had have seen more of - she was in a brief gir/girl scene but unfortunatly one of the doofus actors cut in and made it an uninspired threesome. Do not buy it....rent it instead.
